text: Andy Merrill is an American voice actor best known for voicing Brak and Oglethorpe for adult swim. He used to be a writer for Space Ghost: Coast to Coast. == Voice Acting == * Space Ghost: Coast to Coast - Brak and Lokar * Cartoon Planet - Brak * The Brak Show - Brak and Clarence * Aqua Teen Hunger Force - Oglethorpe * Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters - Oglethorpe Category:Adult Swim
title: Andy Merrill
